verses.verse: I said, <WH559> "Please listen, <WH8085> you heads <WH7218> of Jacob, <WH3290> and rulers <WH7101> of the house <WH1004> of Israel: <WH3478> Isn't <WH3045> it for you to know justice? <WH4941>
You who hate <WH8130> the good, <WH2896> and love <WH157> the evil; <WH7451> who tear off <WH1497> their skin, <WH5785> and their flesh <WH7607> from off their bones; <WH6106>

who also eat <WH398> the flesh <WH7607> of my people, <WH5971> and flay <WH6584> their skin <WH5785> from off them, <WH6476> and break their bones, <WH6106> and chop them in pieces, <WH6566> as for the pot, <WH5518> and as flesh <WH1320> within <WH8432> the caldron. <WH7037>

Then they will cry <WH2199> to Yahweh, <WH3068> but he will not answer <WH6030> them. <WH5641> Yes, he will hide his face <WH6440> from them at that time, <WH6256> because they made their deeds <WH4611> evil. <WH7489>"

Thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> concerning the prophets <WH5030> who lead my people <WH5971> astray; <WH8582> for those who feed <WH5391> their teeth, <WH8127> they proclaim, <WH7121> "Peace! <WH7965>" and whoever doesn't <WH5414> provide for their mouths, <WH6310> they prepare <WH6942> war against him: <WH4421>

"Therefore night <WH3915> is over you, <WH2377> with no vision, and it is dark <WH2821> to you, <WH7080> that you may not divine; and the sun <WH8121> will go down <WH935> on the prophets, <WH5030> and the day <WH3117> will be black over them. <WH6937>

The seers <WH2374> shall be disappointed, <WH954> and the diviners <WH7080> confounded. <WH2659> Yes, <WH5844> they shall all cover their lips; <WH8222> for there is no answer <WH4617> from God. <WH430>"

But as <WH199> for me, <WH4390> I am full of power <WH3581> by the Spirit <WH7307> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and of judgment, <WH4941> and of might, <WH1369> to declare <WH5046> to Jacob <WH3290> his disobedience, <WH6588> and to Israel <WH3478> his sin. <WH2403>

Please listen <WH8085> to this, <WH7218> you heads of the house <WH1004> of Jacob, <WH3290> and rulers <WH7101> of the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> who abhor <WH8581> justice, <WH4941> and pervert <WH6140> all equity. <WH3477>
They build up <WH1129> Zion <WH6726> with blood, <WH1818> and Jerusalem <WH3389> with iniquity. <WH5766>

Her leaders <WH7218> judge <WH8199> for bribes, <WH7810> and her priests <WH3548> teach <WH3384> for a price, <WH4242> and her prophets <WH5030> of it tell fortunes <WH7080> for money: <WH3701> yet they lean <WH8172> on Yahweh, <WH3068> and say, <WH559> "Isn't <WH3068> Yahweh in the midst <WH7130> of us? <WH7451> No disaster will come on us. <WH935>"

Therefore Zion <WH6726> for your sake <WH1558> will be plowed <WH2790> like a field, <WH7704> and Jerusalem <WH3389> will become heaps <WH5856> of rubble, <WH2022> and the mountain of the temple <WH1004> like the high places <WH1116> of a forest. <WH3293>
